recipe.title: Hot Honey Butter
ingredients: 1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, cut into pieces, room temperature
instructions: Vigorously whisk butter, honey, hot sauce, and salt in a medium bowl until smooth.
Do Ahead Butter can be made 8 hours ahead. Cover and store at room temperature.
Butter can be made 8 hours ahead. Cover and store at room temperature.
